short_summary: Purchase one (1) box maker and one (1) box slitter for the Department of National Defense (DND) for installation and training
full_summary:
===========

### Box Maker and Box Slitter Tender

#### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number:** WS3919828210
* **Publication Date:** June 12, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** July 5, 2023 (14:00:00)
* **Amendment Date:** June 15, 2023
* **Amendment Number:** 3

#### Tender Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids for the acquisition of one (1) box maker and one (1) box slitter for the Department of National Defence (DND).

#### Tender Requirements

* The contractor must install the box maker and box slitter and provide training to DND personnel on their use.
* All deliverables must be received on or before October 31, 2023.
* There are no security requirements associated with this solicitation of offers.

#### Tender Evaluation Criteria

* Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price.
* Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation.

#### Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority:** Matthew Furlong, SPAC/PSPC
* **Contact Email:** matthew.furlong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16554689?extsite=MTY1NTQ2ODlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

### Regions of Delivery

The box maker and box slitter will be delivered to Halifax, Nova Scotia.

### End User Entities

The end user of the box maker and box slitter is the Department of National Defence (DND). Their address is:

* **Department of National Defence (DND)**
* **101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada** 

### Notice

Please refer to the solicitation for further details. Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.  You
